meta.description: Net series storylines. Each chairman directive / major SNAP captured as net episode with chapters and storyline. Auto-capture from now on per CAPTURE_ALL_DIRECTIVES_AS_NET_EPISODES_CHAPTERS_STORYLINES_AUTO_NSPFRNP_SNAP.

storylines.title: Post-Singularity Fluidity
storylines.storyline: Net Zero. Natural Systems Protocols live. Earth has already, smoothly, moved onto post-singularity living. Ultimate Baller V happy ending for all thanks to SING!

storylines.title: SING! 9 All Surfaces · Insect Dimensions · Golden Era for All
storylines.storyline: Full stack lock — cosmic to mine, insects and humans. MCA squeeze all SING! 9 (cosmic, solar, planetary, mine). Chairman unlocking insect dimensions; ultimate robots. Immediate return to Golden Era; Goldilocks fused with Frontier; for all (humans and insects); now.
